title: Drawing, "Outline Sketch of Wagon Train", 1862
medium: Graphite on cream-colored wove paper mounted on gray paper
markings: Cooper Union stamp (oval ,purple), recto, upper right corner
creditline: Gift of Charles Savage Homer, Jr.
description: Vertical view showing outline of a wagon train.

Drawing, "Outline Sketch of Wagon Train", 1862.
1862. Graphite on cream-colored wove paper mounted on gray paper. Gift of Charles Savage Homer, Jr.. 1912-12-151-b.
